title: Looking for Colossalis Font
content:
Anyone know where I can find Colossalis Font for a reasonable price. Everywhere I see it is for $99 - $150. I need to make one word in Colossalis (the rest is Distress font, and I want the non distressed original font).

thanks
author: Goose34

comments.content: I doubt you can find it at any discount. Since it's just one word, have you considered drawing it yourself?
